title: Logos that encorporate circles in the design
content: anyone suggest any good logo designs that feature circles as an integral part? like the 'mod target', id be grateful if someone could sugegst some more....cheers!
author: jarvis

comments.content:
hhp, read the post man! :-)

I think though that this illustrates the/one importance of proper capitalization.
